structure.technique_records: ID, description, parameters, dependencies, compatibility, metrics
structure.combination_index: B-tree indexed table of pre-computed combinations
structure.glyph_mappings: Links techniques to micro-glyphs (e.g., 🜅 for performance)

process.goal_mapping: OCC clusters goals into archetypes (e.g., performance, 🜅)
process.technique_selection: RAG retrieves task-technique matrix, Dark_Star scores (speed: 0.5, reliability: 0.3)
process.ordering: Topological sort minimizes latency, glyph-based plan (🜅🜁🔷)

assembly.execution: LSUs execute (<1.2 ms), capsules ensure uptime (99.9999%), Swarm-Driven Multiplexing scales

cbii_occ_role.cbii: Captures vague inputs via conversational flows, glyph-based prompts
cbii_occ_role.occ: Processes multidirectional inputs (NLP, glyphs, API), infers intent, interfaces with DOE

flow: 🜅 What do you want to improve? Games, apps, or else?
Shooter, RPG, or all games on your PC?
example.order: OGF → QR Compression → Glyph Optimization → LSU Execution → Agent Learning
example.outcome: .lua script optimizes games (120+ FPS, <1 ms lag), glyph-only output
